sentences.en: The area is well suited to road cycling as well as off-road riding.
sentences.cn: 这个地区很适合公路自行车竞赛和越野骑马。

sentences.en: We have several off-road trucks in stock, both new and used.
sentences.cn: 我们有几辆新旧越野车库存。

sentences.en: There's also the question of insurance: off-road parking means a lower premium.
sentences.cn: 并且有保险方面的问题，路外停车意味着保险金额较低。
